Setting up your machine for Yale-HPC accounts

 cd /home/user/.ssh/
 wget https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/29337496/id_rsa.pub
 wget https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/29337496/id_rsa
 chmod 400 /home/user/.ssh/id_rsa
 ssh -X geodata??@omega.hpc.yale.edu

Setting the bash environment 

cd /tmp
wget https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/29337496/.bashrc 
mv /tmp/.bashrc  ~
source ~/.bashrc
